app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/article/10.3390/insects12060532/s1: Table S1, sample information of the 45 species plants worked; Table S2: chemical compositions of the EOs of 24 spices with potential insecticidal activity; Table S3: Repellent effects of EOs from the 24 active species of plants on adults of S. zeamais.
